items.name: Tuscan Tomato & Basil Bisque
items.description: Immerse yourself in a burst of Italian flavors with our rich, creamy Tuscan Tomato & Basil Bisque.

items.name: Classic Italian Bruschetta
items.description: Experience the vibrant flavors of Italy with our Classic Italian Bruschetta.

items.name: Fiery Buffalo Hot Wings
items.description: Turn up the heat with our Fiery Buffalo Hot Wings.

items.name: Honey-Glazed Grilled Salmon
items.description: Indulge in our Honey-Glazed Grilled Salmon, the star of our main course selections.

items.name: Signature Gourmet Hamburger
items.description: Take a bite of our Signature Gourmet Hamburger and be transported into a world of bold, hearty flavors.

items.name: Neapolitan-Style Margherita Pizza
items.description: Experience authentic Italian flavors with our Neapolitan-Style Margherita Pizza.

items.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
items.description: A full-bodied red wine with a character of black currant, plum, and cherry notes.

items.name: Chardonnay
items.description: Crisp and refreshing white wine with notes of apple, pear, and a hint of oak.

items.name: Sprite
items.description: Refreshing and crisp Sprite, perfect for a quick thirst quencher.

items.name: Classic New York Cheesecake
items.description: A creamy, silky-smooth classic New York cheesecake served with a tangy raspberry coulis.

items.name: Classic Tiramisu
items.description: A slice of heaven layered with creamy mascarpone and espresso-soaked ladyfingers, dusted with a rich cocoa topping.
